rules.title: Game Rules
rules.step1: Use arrow keys or swipe to move tiles
rules.step2: When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one
rules.step3: Create a tile with the number 2048 to win
rules.tip: Tip: Plan your moves carefully to achieve higher scores!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: 2048 is a single-player sliding block puzzle game. The game's objective is to slide numbered tiles on a grid to combine them and create a tile with the number 2048.
faq.a2: You win by creating a tile with the number 2048. This is done by combining tiles with the same numbers.
faq.q3: What happens when the board is full?
faq.a3: The game ends when there are no more possible moves (i.e., no empty cells and no adjacent tiles with the same number).
faq.a4: Keep your highest numbers in a corner and try to maintain a chain of decreasing numbers. This makes it easier to combine tiles effectively.
